txt.en: Bregrochon is gone. Naerdolen lost track of him somewhere in the northern caves when they were attacked by Black Númenóreans. He fears that his long-time friend has been taken to the dungeons of Dol Guldur.

'Bregrochon! Where are you, my friend? If only I had not lost sight of you, the cursed Black Númenóreans would not have found you unprotected. Why did I stop for that....

'Oh! Greetings. I did not see you there. I have come to the Mourning Well in the hope that the Valar will aid my friend Bregrochon. We were exploring the caves to the north, but I stopped, and he was captured just around the bend. I wish I had not been so distracted. I would have been able to save him, I know.  

'Now they have taken him to the dungeons of Dol Guldur. It is a sad day, indeed. I can only hope that you have come here to aid me. Is it so? Will you find my friend and bring him back alive?'
Bregrochon is in the Dungeons of Dol Guldur.
'What fortune! The Valar smile down on us this day. You have answered my hopes.\n\n'Thank you for saving my friend. It would have been a long journey West without him.'
Naerdolen is at the Mourning Well in Emyn Lûm, west of Dol Guldur.\n\nYou should return to Naerdolen and tell him that you have found and freed Bregrochon.
Tell Person B that you have found Prisoner B.
Talk to Naerdolen near the Mourning Well
Tell Person B that you have found Prisoner B
